original_text: And if the Lord your God enlarges your territory, as he has sworn to your fathers, and gives you all the land that he promised to give to your fathers—
korean_text: 네 하나님 여호와께서 네 조상들에게 맹세하신 대로 네 지경을 넓혀 네 조상들에게 주리라고 말씀하신 땅을 다 네게 주실 때

sentences.original_text: And if the Lord your God enlarges your territory
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 주 너의 하나님이 너의 영토를 넓혀주신다면

sentences.original_text: as he has sworn to your fathers
and gives you all the land
that he promised to give to your fathers
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너의 조상들에게 주기로 약속하신 땅을
